description: Enterprise techniques used by PsExec, ATT&CK software S0029 v1.1
name: PsExec (S0029)

techniques.comment: PsExec can be used to download or upload a file over a network share.[3]
PsExec, a tool that has been used by adversaries, writes programs to the ADMIN$ network share to execute commands on remote systems.[3]
Microsoft Sysinternals PsExec is a popular administration tool that can be used to execute binaries on remote systems using a temporary Windows service.[1]
